https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dlO202YuDmyXS3vVZMcFvBlYL0v.jpg Investigates the politics of cinematic shot design, and how this meta-level of filmmaking intersects with the twin epidemics of sexual abuse/assault and employment discrimination against women, with over 80 movie clips from 1896 - 2020. Brainwashed: Sex-Camera-Power
